recipe.title: Strawberry Banana Margarita
instructions: In a blender, purée the strawberries and the banana, peeled and broken into pieces, with the tequila, the Triple Sec, the lemon juice and 1 cup cracked ice, scraping down the sides occasionally, until the mixture is smooth but still frozen and divide the mixture between 2 stemmed glasses.
